    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transformation in a light bulb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energietransformation in einer Glühlampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation d'énergie dans une ampoule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia em um bulbo claro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia in una lampadina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακός μετασχηματισμός σε έναν ελαφρύ βολβό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía en una bombilla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light bulb transfers energy to its surroundings mostly as heat (red wavy rays) and partly as light (yellow rays).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Glühlampe Energie 
auf seine Umlagerungen meistens als Hitze (rote wellenförmige 
Strahlen) und teils als Licht überträgt (gelbe Strahlen).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que l'ampoule transfère
l'énergie à ses environnements la plupart du temps comme chaleur 
(rayons onduleux rouges) et en partie comme lumière (rayons jaunes).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o bulbo claro 
transfere a energia a seus arredors na maior parte como o calor (raios
ondulados vermelhos) e em parte como a luz (raios amarelos).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la lampadina 
trasferisce l'energia ai relativi dintorni principalmente come calore 
(raggi ondulati rossi) e parzialmente come luce (raggi gialli).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο ελαφρύς βολβός 
μεταφέρει την ενέργεια στα περίχωρά του συνήθως ως θερμότητα 
(κόκκινες κυματιστές ακτίνες) και εν μέρει ως φως (κίτρινες 
ακτίνες).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la bombilla 
transfiere energía a sus alrededores sobre todo como calor (rayos 
ondulados rojos) y en parte como luz (rayos amarillos).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
